item.title: Text munching in R?

item.title: The Cathedral and the Bazaar: What is a Useful Notion of “Language”?
item.description: Why Noam Chomsky's approach to linguistics is broken, and why you should take a look at agent-based models of language evolution.
item.dc:creator: dlukes

item.title: How computers handle text: a gentle but thorough introduction to Unicode
item.description: An introductory text about computer text encodings, primarily aimed at linguists.

item.title: Úprava rozhraní konkordanceru KonText -- vylepšená verze

item.title: Beyond semantic versioning? (cross-post)
item.description: Semantic versioning is a good idea, but it would be better to use an explicit keyword system to signal (non-)breaking changes in library versions.
item.dc:creator: dlukes

item.title: Filling (hardwrapping) paragraphs in Airmail with `par`
item.description: How to use par for conveniently filling (hardwrapping) paragraphs in plain text e-mail in Airmail [Beta] on OS X.
item.dc:creator: dlukes
